question: 倍
sourceMnemonic: Throw this onto a number and you have yourself the number of <vocabulary>times</vocabulary> something has increased. For example, <ja>３倍</ja> means something increased "three fold."
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the one you learned with the kanji. Omit the <ja>〜</ja> when writing out the answer, though. That just represents that there should be something before the kanji in this word when being used.
